transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hi sir, good morning.
Customer: Morning ji.
Executive: Bhumika baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se, kaise hain?
Customer: Haan ji badhiya ji.
Executive: Great sir, aapne sir services ka usage fir se kam kar diya hai?
Customer: Kam kar diya.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Ab aayi.
Executive: Ab aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji main ye bol rahi hu sir aapne bola tha na ki 15th of September ke baad use karenge.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Lekin usage to abhi aap kar hi nahi rahe hain sir, kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Isme na hamara hamara kya bataye aapko isme na hamare ko ye aapka change karna padega product hamare ko jo hai na.
Executive: Change karna padega product?
Customer: Isme na aapke manufacturer nahi dikha rakha hai.
Executive: Kya nahi dikha rakha hai?
Customer: Manufacturer nahi dikha rakha hai isme. Koi retailer, wholesaler dikha rakha hai usi hisab se demand aati hai usko kya kare hum?
Executive: Haan sahi hai, haan sir aapne profile pe to trader aur retailer dal rakha hai na.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji wohi samasya ho rahi hai. To hamare ko dealing karni hoti hai large scale mein usme koi hamare ko na to phone aata hai na koi usme aapki lead aati hai kya kare?
Executive: Main batati hu, main batati hu kya hota hai sir dekho phone.
Customer: Isme na hamare ko GST mein change karwa ke aur fir hamare ko ye karna padega fir isme chahe hamare ko koi fayda ho jaye.
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi hai sir woh baat to thik hai aapki lekin ye retail ki lead hai na ye to aayengi hi aapke paas aisa nahi hai ki woh thodi kam hongi lekin fir bhi aisa nahi hai ki band ho jayengi. Aur abhi ke time mein sir large scale wali jo quantity bol rahe ho na aap uski bhi lead aati hai panel mein lekin us time pe jaise aap available nahi hai aapne dekha nahi to woh sold out ho jati hai. To isliye isko sir aapne bata maine.
Customer: Haan kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: Grain ki aati hai grain ki.
Customer: Grain ki aati hai na abhi aapne jaise mung mung seed guar seed.
Customer: Haan seed ki nahi aati grain ki aati hai.
Executive: Seed ki bhi aati hai sir aisa nahi hai seed ki nahi aati. Abhi bhi aap open karoge na to aapke paas Haryana ki padi hui hai business use ke liye lead hai. Grass seed ki hai lekin woh ek barley seed ki hai.
Customer: Dekh leta hu main.
Executive: Ek baar aap check karo aur dusra sir ek option aur main aapko dikhati hu ek baar aap phone mein IndiaMART open kar sakte ho? Do teen option dikha deti hu aapko jahan se aap lead dekh paoge.
Customer: Main raste mein hu main office mein pahunch ke fir aapse baat karta hu.
Executive: Achcha kitni der mein pahunch jayenge aap?
Customer: 15-20 minute mein.
Executive: Chalenge na sir main call back karti hu fir 15-20 minute mein aapko.
Customer: Haan aadhe ghante baad hi kariye aap.
Executive: Chaliye abhi 10 10 ho rahe hain sir to main aapko lagau fir 10:45 kareeb 10:45.
Customer: Haan isme na wohi ek to GST mein change karwana hai to hum GST mein change karwa lenge.
Executive: Woh to sir thoda lamba process hai na jaise abhi mujhe lagta hai agar aaj daloge aap to do se teen din mein change hota hai na woh to.
Customer: Haan woh to thik hai lekin ye to lambe time kam karna na hamare ko koi.
Executive: Haan woh to hai sir woh to hai lekin main aapko wohi bol rahi hu sir ki aap change bhi nahi karwayenge na to bhi lead to aapke paas aa rahi hai abhi bhi aa rahi hai. Halaki aapko bade scale pe karna hai to woh aap change kara hi lena woh to important hai hi aapke liye. Lekin abhi bhi aapki bade scale wali leads aa rahi hai panel mein.
Customer: Woh woh kya hai na woh aise hai jaise ab wheat mein aa rahi hai to woh grain walon ki aa rahi hai chakki walon ki jo aata banate hain. Lekin hamare ko aate mein nahi na bechna ye hamare ko ye to jo beej ka kam karte hain retailer hai unko bechna hota hai.
Executive: Haan aapne mujhe bataya sir woh cheez ab main aapko wohi bata rahi hu ki maine mere ko na sir ek ek lead ek baar jaise mere ko apni team ko ek baar share karna hai ki kis tarike ki lead aapke paas aati hai hai na aur aapko kis tarike ka to uske liye mere ko ek ek lead pe aap baat karni padegi to mere ko lead dekh ke hi aapko lead dikha ke hi aap bata paoge aur main bhi tabhi samajh paungi ki woh kam ki thi aapke liye ya nahi hai na to abhi aap call nahi sakte kya aapke paas kholo na isko?
Executive: Khola hai na sir wohi main bol rahi hu jaise mere paas to dekho dikha raha hai mustard seed thik hai usko requirement hai yahan par dala hua hai usne business use ke liye usko chahiye thik hai mustard seed ki requirement hai Amritsar Punjab ki to location ka to sir aapko koi problem hai nahi hai na lekin aap.
Customer: Location ki problem nahi hai lekin woh to tel nikalne ke liye mang raha hai na.
Executive: Ye aapko kaise pata?
Customer: Mere ko pata hai ji woh oil purpose ke liye mang raha hai woh usko rate bol denge 200 250 to woh mang usko koi jarurat nahi hai na uski. Usko to woh loose mein chahiye 50 kilo bore mein.
Executive: Achcha ye matlab Punjab ke customer ko aise chahiye hota hai is basis pe bata rahe ho aap mujhe.
Customer: Ji woh hamare ko hamare ko pata lag jata hai na bhi kaun kya mang raha hai.
Executive: Aap batao ki kahan ka customer aasani se aapko lagta hai ki convert ho sakta hai.
Customer: Nahi dekho ji ab season off ho gaya man liya uska mustard ka to hamare ko pata hai seed seed mein to koi mang nahi raha. Achcha mustard ko ab to oil oil purpose ke liye mang raha hai jisne tel nikalna hai aur pack karna hai ya usme retail mein to abhi aapko kaun se product pe jyada lead chahiye sir ye bataye.
Executive: Abhi wheat ka chal raha hai hamara.
Customer: Wheat ka.
Executive: Haan ji wheat mein hamare paas abhi bacha bacha hua material hai 303 DBW 303 wheat hai.
Executive: Ji agar aap is isko aap sahyog karo to wheat DBW.
Customer: Mere paas aapke char panch hai sir wheat pe product ek to DBW 303 hai ek HD 2851 hai ek aapka Raj 1482 hai aur ek hai WH 1270.
Customer: Chalo isme naye mein aur dalo aap DBW 3 371.
Executive: 371.
Customer: Haan ji DBW 371.
Executive: Thik hai. Aur ek PBW.
Customer: P P for Punjab Punjab haan P aur W hai na kya aage?
Customer: Haan 826 826.
Executive: Thik hai aur bataye.
Customer: Haan ye do varieties aur nayi hai hamare paas isme koi lead aayegi to hum dealing kar lenge koi 100 quintal ki koi 50 quintal ki 200 quintal ki.
Executive: Hmmm hmmm hmmm hmmm.
Customer: To hamare paas iske alawa 400 quintal material bacha hua hai ye abhi.
Executive: Achcha okay iske alawa sir abhi jaise bean seed hai cluster seed guar seed in sab mein nahi abhi karna apne ko.
Customer: Nahi abhi usme to hum purchasing kar rahe hain na.
Executive: Achcha usme purchasing kar rahe hain hum abhi uska to abhi process hoega fir usko bechhenge.
Executive: Abhi sir wheat seeds ki requirement bahut jyada aa rahi hai ek apni sir ye black mustard seed ki bhi requirement abhi kafi jyada aa rahi hai.
Customer: Black mustard to abhi season off ho gaya. Seed wala to.
Executive: Achcha okay. Haan ji. Okay okay okay.
Executive: Okay seed wala off ho gaya thik hai. Wheat mein aur lekin abhi na sir August se black mustard ki jahan pe har mahine 600 700 lead aa rahi thi wahan pe ab 3000 4000 lead aa rahi hai August se. To woh shayad seed basis pe nahi hoga kuch aur hoga.
Customer: 15 August ke baad se 15 September tak ya 1 October 2 October tak chalta hai mustard ka 15 October tak chal jata hai. Abhi abhi to wheat ka aur barley ka season hai abhi wheat barley mein koi lead aayegi to main dekh leta hu.
Executive: Achcha okay.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Hmmm thik hai sir aap ek kam kariye ek baar aap office pahunch jaiye fir main ek baar aapko connect karti hu tab aap phone mein IndiaMART open kariyega. Thik hai na sir.
Customer: Haan ji. Thik hai.
Executive: Chaliye main aapko karti hu 11 baje kareeb.
Customer: Haan ji. Chaliye okay okay.
Customer: Ye do varieties dal di na aapne?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants manufacturer to be displayed in profile.

- Not getting leads for large scale dealing.

- Retail leads are not useful.

- Wants to change GST details.

- Wants leads for wheat.



Resolution:

- Executive explained retail leads will keep coming.

- Large scale leads come but get sold out.

- Executive will share leads with team.

- Executive will call back at 10:45 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to connect after customer reaches office.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, leads, gst, wheat, seeds
